publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1586 Tricia Marwick: East Fife FC - Congratulations—That the Parliament congratulates East Fife Football Club for winning promotion to the Second Division; notes that it is the first team in Britain to achieve promotion in season 2007-08, and applauds the efforts of the players, management and coaches for this magnificent achievement which has brought such joy to the people of the Methil area who look forward to further success next season.

S3M-1586 East Fife FC - Congratulations (lodged on 17 March 2008) Ted Brocklebank*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jamie McGrigor*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, David McLetchie*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Keith Brown*
S3M-1586 East Fife FC - Congratulations (lodged on 17 March 2008) Brian Adam*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-1586 Tricia Marwick: East Fife FC - Congratulations—That the Parliament congratulates East Fife Football Club for winning promotion to the Second Division; notes that it is the first team in Britain to achieve promotion in season 2007-08, and applauds the efforts of the players, management and coaches for this magnificent achievement which has brought such joy to the people of the Methil area who look forward to further success next season. Supported by: Ted Brocklebank, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Jamie McGrigor, Jamie Hepburn, Stuart McMillan, David McLetchie, Bashir Ahmad, Rob Gibson, Keith Brown, Brian Adam, Gil Paterson
S3M-1586 East Fife FC - Congratulations (lodged on 17 March 2008) Aileen Campbell*
